seo.title: Car rentals in Omaha, NE | FriendRenter
seo.metaDescription: Local car rentals in Omaha — verified people, fair prices, quick pickup near Eppley, Old Market, and Midtown. Friends-first bookings with clear protections.

hero.headline: Omaha car rentals — no counter, no lines.
hero.subhead: Old Market, Midtown, Benson — verified cars across the city. Add → accept → book.

faq.q: How do bookings work in Omaha?
faq.a: Everything runs through the FriendRenter app: add the host as a friend → get accepted → confirm your booking → meet at an agreed public spot.

faq.q: Do I have to be friends to book?
faq.a: Yes—friends-only. Send a friend request (or include it with your booking request) and wait for host acceptance to confirm.
Common spots are public garages/lots around Old Market, Midtown Crossing, or neighborhood centers. Your host will specify the exact location in the app.
Often the rideshare lot or another public area near the terminal. Curbside handoff is at the host’s discretion and may depend on airport rules and timing.
Event nights can be crowded—plan extra time and pick a garage with predictable access for both pickup and return.

faq.q: Who sets deposits, age, and requirements?
faq.a: Hosts do. Deposit amount, minimum age, and any extra requirements are host-defined and shown before you book.
Hosts set mileage limits and any extras (e.g., cleaning). You’ll see limits up front, and any overages are settled afterward.
If the car’s available, yes. Request the extension in the app ahead of time so the host can approve.
Return fuel to the agreed level and follow any host return notes. Tolls/incidentals are reconciled after the trip.
Hosts choose the rules. Review the listing for smoking/pets and cleaning expectations before you confirm.
Bookings include clear protections plus photo check-in/out. Coverage details and responsibilities are shown before you confirm.

faq.q: What if I need to change or cancel?
faq.a: Manage it in the app. The host’s policy applies; you’ll see timing windows and any fees before you finalize changes.
